content: escarpment cowl by kelly mcclure escarpment cowl by kelly mcclure cuddle up in this snuggly cozy cowl it knits up in no time using a bulky fisherman s rib which is a cousin of the brioche stitch it looks great with any outfit the fabric is stretchy and mushy making it extra comfy this cowl is knit flat using a provisional cast on - the ends are then grafted together stitches are slipped at the sides making a soft edge and clean lines this cowl has one size and has a slightly visible seam bohoknits patterns 2015 © kelly mcclure kelly@bohoknits com this pattern is for personal
